candidates.why: Closest multi-agent planning command: Task delegation + AskUserQuestion decision points + session artifacts under .workflow + ACE context gathering.
Same planning family (multi-phase), strong session/artifact conventions and error-handling patterns.
Same execution handoff pattern to lite-execute; good baseline for user-confirmation gates and auto-mode behavior.
Useful read-only validation/reporting structure and artifact verification steps for plans.
Useful interactive questioning flow and session-level updates, but less aligned with multi-agent delegation.

selected.why: Best overall match for orchestrator boundary + Task-based delegation + .workflow session artifacts; easiest to reuse patterns without copying content.
